text: Bad Santa is a 2003 American Christmas criminal black comedy movie. ==Cast== * Billy Bob Thornton * Tony Cox * Brett Kelly * Lauren Graham ==Soundtrack== # Nocturne No. 2 in E-Flat Minor Op 9 # Jingle Bell Rock by Bobby Sherman ==References== Category:2003 comedy-drama movies Category:2003 crime drama movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Christmas movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Phoenix, Arizona in fiction
title: Bad Santa
